project_abstract.cdata: The objective of the Tuberculosis Control Project for China is to reduce tuberculosis morbidity and mortality through an effective and sustainable National Tuberculosis Control Program, especially among the poor. The project has three broad components, one at the national level and two at the provincial level. The first component has three subcomponents, which strengthen institutions at the national level, including establishing a central project coordination group; strengthening a central management unit to carry out a national tuberculosis control program; and strengthening a central reference laboratory with required staff and resources. The second subcomponent assists the government in developing policy guidelines and specific components of the national TB control program, while the third subcomponent ensures the coordination and management of the implementation of project activities. The second component, also comprises three subcomponents and implements an evidence-based program management and improves management and usage of drugs and equipment; improves case detection and improves the cure rate; as well as implementing program-oriented research activities, developing and implementing an action plan for information dissemination and education, developing and implementing plans to deliver treatments to hard-to-reach populations, and piloting treatment programs. The third component establishes offices, strengthens TB control institutions, and improves human resources.

P071147.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>中国结核病控制项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是通过有效及可持续地实施《全国结核病防治规划》降低中国结核病发病率和死亡率，尤其是贫困人口的发病率和死亡率。本项目设有三大子项目，包括一个国家级子项目和两个省级子项目。第一个子项目包含旨在加强国家机构的三个二级子项目，第一个二级子项目的内容为建立中央项目协调小组、加强负责实施《全国结核病防治规划》的中央管理部门、通过配备所需人员和资源加强中央参考实验室；第二个二级子项目将协助政府部门制定政策指南和《全国结核病防治规划》的具体内容；第三个二级子项目将为项目活动的实施提供管理和协调保障。第二个子项目也包括三个二级子项目，其具体内容包括开展基于实证的规划管理工作、改进药品和设备管理和使用、加强病例监测、提高治愈率、开展以规划为导向的研究工作、制定并实施信息传播和教育行动计划、制定并实施向难以接近人群提供治疗服务的计划、试点实施治疗方案等。第三个子项目将建立项目办公室，加强结核病防治机构能力，完善并增加人力资源。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
